 2006-05752006-06-23,  ,  ,  CBSA, 
ActCustoms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the REPORTING OF IMPORTED GOODS REGULATIONS by specifying that a CSA carrier or a registered driver can make an oral report on eligible goods and by requiring that a person in charge of a conveyance notify a Customs Officer, in advance of their arrival, of any changes to the information in their advance notice.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0155 Publication Date: 2006-07-12
